content: अनिलः [अनिति जीवति अनेन, अन् इलच् <ls>Uṇ. 1. 54</ls>] {@--1@} Wind; प्राणानामनिलेन वृत्तिरुचिता <ls>Ś. 7. 12</ls>; स सखा दीप इवानिलाहतः <ls>Ku. 4. 30.</ls> (The number of winds is 7: --आवहो निवहश्चैव उद्वहः संवहस्तथा . विवहः प्रवहश्चैव परिवाहस्तथैव च .. and these are again subdivided into 7 divisions, the total number being 49). {@--2@} The god of wind. {@--3@} One of the subordinate deities, 49 of whom form the class of winds. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of one of the 8 Vasus, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} the fifth. {@--5@} The wind in the body, one of the humours; °हन्, °हृत्, °घ्न. {@--6@} Rheumatism or any disease referred to disorder of the wind. {@--7@} The letter य्. {@--8@} Symbolical expression for the number 49. {@--9@} <ab>N.</ab> of the lunar asterism स्वाति. {@--10@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu (तस्य प्राणात्मना सर्वदेहधारणात् तथात्वं).
